title: IHC Acquires eFunder and Rebrands as Zelo
description: IHC completed the acquisition of eFunder, a UAE-based private financing platform for SMEs, and rebranded it as Zelo. Zelo targets the USD 250 billion SME credit shortfall across MENA by providing fast, digital invoice financing to SMEs in sectors such as construction, logistics, healthcare, industrial services, and oil & gas. The platform operates under ADGM FSRA regulations and has facilitated over 9,000 transactions with more than USD 200 million in funding deployed. This acquisition is part of IHC's strategic commitment to fintech innovation and enabling SME growth with faster access to working capital.
source_name: IHC Completes Acquisition of eFunder and Rebrands the Platform as Zelo to Strengthen SME Capital Access in the UAE

opportunities.title: SME Accounting Software Integration Partnership
opportunities.description: A company developing cloud-based accounting or ERP software can partner with Zelo to integrate direct invoice financing options within their platform for SME users. This is realistic as SMEs using such software would benefit from seamless access to working capital, while Zelo gains expanded channel access to qualified SMEs.
roadmap_steps: Identify overlap between user bases and invoice management functionalities.
Reach out to Zelo partnership or business development team.
Propose a technical integration plan for invoice data sharing compliant with data privacy standards.
Develop co-branded marketing materials to announce the feature.
Implement pilot with select SME clients, collect feedback, and scale integration.

opportunities.title: Construction Supplier Invoice Factoring Program
opportunities.description: A construction materials supplier can cooperate with Zelo to offer dynamic invoice factoring to its SME contractor clients at the point of sale, allowing faster payments and increased order sizes. This makes sense given the sector's reliance on invoice-based transactions and working capital constraints.
roadmap_steps: Map out invoice processing and payment flow with SME contractors.
Negotiate terms for introductory rates or exclusive financing offers with Zelo.
Educate supplierâ€™s internal sales and customer support teams on the offering.
Co-promote the financing option to SME clients through web portal/app and in-person sales.
Collect performance data and adjust partnership terms as needed.

opportunities.title: Healthcare Equipment Distributor Instant Financing Integration
opportunities.description: A healthcare equipment distributor can partner with Zelo to integrate instant invoice financing for SME clinics and hospitals purchasing large ticket items, accelerating payment cycles and increasing sales while helping SMEs bridge cash flow gaps for essential purchases.
roadmap_steps: Analyze purchasing patterns and typical invoice terms of SME buyers.
Initiate contact with Zelo business development for API integration options.
Develop a client onboarding guide explaining the benefits and usage of invoice financing.
Launch the program during a targeted industry event or via digital marketing.
Gather results, testimonials, and optimize for increased uptake.

opportunities.title: Oil & Gas Services Vendor Early Payment Solution
opportunities.description: A company providing field services or equipment rental in the oil & gas sector can link its invoicing system to Zelo, enabling SME subcontractors to access early payment for approved invoices, reducing payment disputes and increasing subcontractor loyalty.
roadmap_steps: Assess pain points in current invoice payment timelines for SME subcontractors.
Reach out to Zelo for integration feasibility and pilot terms.
Create clear communication channels for subcontractors to access the financing option.
Monitor program performance and satisfaction regularly.
Adjust financing offers, possibly subsidizing part of the fee for key partners.

opportunities.title: SME Logistics Platform Embedded Finance Offering
opportunities.description: A digital freight and logistics management platform can partner with Zelo to provide embedded invoice financing to SME trucking or logistics firms, allowing them to manage cash flow and maintain vehicle fleets without waiting for slow-paying clients.
roadmap_steps: Review platform transaction volumes and invoice values.
Initiate discussions with Zelo to define an embedded financing option.
Integrate Zelo's financing offer into booking and payment workflows.
Train customer support on how to help users apply for and manage financing.
Jointly launch and promote the offering to platform users.
